name: The Ghosts of Everly Park Cemetery
name_original: The Ghosts of Everly Park Cemetery
description:
💖 Made by Jamie D'Amato   |   🐦 Twitter   |   📸 Instagram   |   ☕ Ko-Fi

Elise is a medium. Zoe is the ghost she's supposed to be guiding to the afterlife. Except, nothing's ever that simple.

The Ghosts of Everly Park Cemetery is a short interactive fiction story at about 10,000 words.
